SNACKBAR.MESSAGE_SUBMIT_SUCCESS: Message sent succesfully. We will be in touch very soon!
SNACKBAR.MESSAGE_SUBMIT_ERROR: An error occurred. Please, try again.

ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION1: We're a technically driven team passionate about AI since 2016, with experience across banking, education, logistics, and telecom.
ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION2: Since launching this project in 2022, we've gained investor backing, joined Techstars, and delivered AI solutions for sectors including blockchain and UK startups.
ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION3: Today, we focus on helping manufacturers unlock value through intelligent automation and data-driven decision-making.

CONTACT_SECTION.SECTION_DESCRIPTION: We're not building AI for the sake of it. We're building AI that respects how people already get things done and helps them do it even better.

CARD1.TITLE: AI that Follows Your Best Engineer
CARD1.DESCRIPTION: Our solution uses AI to capture and organize all of your team's best insights so they can speed through future endeavors.

CARD2.TITLE: AI-Powered Summarization
CARD2.DESCRIPTION: Save time by replacing manual reports of experiments with automated summaries.

CARD3.TITLE: Secure, Self-Owned Database
CARD3.DESCRIPTION: All your critical knowledge gathered in one place, private and accessible to you, owned by you.

CARD1.TITLE: Let's book a call.
CARD1.SUBTITLE: Choose a time that works for you.

CARD2.TITLE: Not ready for a call? Send us a message.
CARD2.SUBTITLE: We'll respond to you shortly, typically within a few hours.

CONTACT_FORM_INPUTS.MESSAGEPLACEHOLDER: How can we help? Fell free to share any details.

WHAT_WE_DO_SECTION.TITLE: Maximize Your Manufacturing Potential
WHAT_WE_DO_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Lysia Labs enables you to accelerate sales and R&D by accessing your hard-earned insights from previous factory floor experiments with AI.

CARD1.TITLE: Preserve Knowledge When Teams Change
CARD1.DESCRIPTION: Capture engineering wisdom so that when someone goes away, their insights stay within the company.

CARD2.TITLE: Accelerate The Research Of Your Company
CARD2.DESCRIPTION: Recycle valuable knowledge from all your past research and don't waste your time on things you already did.

CARD3.TITLE: Reduce Time Spent On Documentation
CARD3.DESCRIPTION: Our AI structures, creates, and organizes your data, so your team can focus on what really matters.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Never Lose Critical Know-How Again
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Capture insights from every factory floor experiment, successful or not, and boost your sales.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Turn everyday experiences, even those that didn't go well, into accessible learning.

Easily document what works (and what doesn't) and continuously improve your processes and outcomes.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Don't waste time on reports
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Sales teams lose time every week gathering data instead of acting on it.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Your data is automatically structured, analyzed, and clearly presented.

Less time on repetitive tasks, more focus on strategic decisions.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Quoting shouldn't take this long
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Elaborating a proposal shouldn't feel like starting from scratch every time.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Avoid the chaos of disorganized folders and scattered notes.

Our technology automatically indexes your team's content, making everything easy to find, share, and reuse without manual effort.

FOOTER.SLOGAN_SUBTITLE: Stay in touch with LYSIA Labs.
